DataElement.preferredName: Text Encapsulation Data Restriction Extensible Markup Language ISO21090.XMLv1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The words of something written.:The process or condition of being enclosed.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:Anything that limits; a limitation._A general-purpose markup language for creating special-purpose markup languages. It is capable of describing many different kinds of data. Its primary purpose is to facilitate the sharing of data across different systems, particularly systems connected via the Internet._A placeholder for any XML content.

Property.preferredDefinition: A general-purpose markup language for creating special-purpose markup languages. It is capable of describing many different kinds of data. Its primary purpose is to facilitate the sharing of data across different systems, particularly systems connected via the Internet.
